Identification.LongTitle: Order Authorizing The Canadian Corps of Commissionaires to Wear the Medal of Commissionaire Long Service Medal

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes members of The Canadian Corps of Commissionaires who have received the Commissionaire Long Service Medal in recognition of twelve years of exemplary service with that organization, to wear the Medal and any Bars awarded subsequently, in conjunction with other official awards; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that this Medal follow the Service Medal of The Most Venerable Order of St. John of Jerusalem in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
